item.description:
If you're thinking that the Kennebunk Meet-Up is too far south for you, never fear, the Augusta Animal Welfare Meet-Up is here!

Following the same format as the prior Portland Meet-up, this will be a chance for Augusta area activists to get together and learn about the animal welfare issues in Maine, upcoming legislation and easy ways to get involved.

Whether you're a savvy armchair lobbyist, or brand new to the animal welfare arena, this Meet Up is for you!

Please join us at the Kennebec Valley Humane Society and let your voice be heard for animals!

group.name: The Maine Animal Welfare Meetup Group

item.name: Augusta Animal Welfare Meet-Up
